text: Hi all,  Just to point two i just discover today.  1.- SPF EMAIL SETUP with HubSpot.  The  SPF record from HubSpot show Two Lookups! and the maximun is Ten. So in this case with a big client with many SPF we where at 9 and as there are two inside the SPF HubSpot. we had over pass to 11.  Will be great to have a look on to this :wink: . Reference - <https://sendgrid.com/docs/ui/account-and-settings/spf-limitations/>

2.- Point.-  TRANSACTIONAL EMAIL. - there is no way to limited access and / or use of it for the users. That means if you have 40 users  ( yes fourty)   you have a highly potential use of it. The dangerous zone here is the GDPR complaint. TRANSCATIONAL EMAILS ELIMINATE THE footer option to unsubscribe and/or change subscriptions. Last.- There is no way to know how many transactional emails have being send with in HubSpot.
Super Dev heroes ! this is for you! :wink: thanks a lot in advance !
